Powered By

React

The library for web and native interfaces. Next.js is built on React 18+.

Turbopack

An incremental bundler optimized for JS/TS, written in Rust, and built into Next.js.

Speedy Web Compiler

An extensible Rust based platform for fast developer tools, used for compilation.
